verses.name: Psalms 1:1
verses.text: Blessed is the man that walketh not in the counsel of the ungodly, nor standeth in the way of sinners, nor sitteth in the seat of the scornful.

verses.name: Psalms 1:2
verses.text: But his delight is in the law of the Lord; and in his law doth he meditate day and night.

verses.name: Psalms 1:3
verses.text: And he shall be like a tree planted by the rivers of water, that bringeth forth his fruit in his season; his leaf also shall not wither; and whatsoever he doeth shall prosper.

verses.name: Psalms 1:4
verses.text: The ungodly are not so: but are like the chaff which the wind driveth away.
